example.text: The rail unions and rail companies were forced by the Biden Administration to come to the table and hammer out a deal. This process is called a "Presidential Emergency Board," and will always favor the corporations over the workers.

This vote received widespread support in the House of Representatives, but due to the filibuster, Senate Republicans, and Senator Joe Manchin, the paid sick leave did not pass the Senate. To be clear, I voted no on approving a labor agreement that was not supported by the majority of rail workers, but I voted yes on adding paid sick leave to their contract.

That is why I joined several of my colleagues in offering an amendment that would ensure rail workers received the paid sick days that they deserve and are demanding. I was proud to join the workers in this fight and vote for the inclusion of paid sick leave in their contract today."

If the rail industry wants to avert a national rail strike, then they should provide their employees with guaranteed paid sick leave. As for the Democratic party, if we are going to be the party of the working class, we need to stand with workers every time."

Our Statements and Letters: Tlaib Statement on Legislation to Impose National Rail Contract Last week, Congresswoman Rashida Tlaib (MI-13) released the following statement on legislation to impose a national rail contract: "Every worker in America deserves paid sick leave.
